text:
Version 1.3 Alpha 8.
This works in 1.3 Alpha 7.

You get an NPE when a FileAppender's BufferedIO is set to true. For example:

log4j.appender.TextFile=org.apache.log4j.FileAppender
log4j.appender.TextFile.Append=false
log4j.appender.TextFile.BufferedIO=true
log4j.appender.TextFile.File=${java.io.tmpdir}/log/ais.log
log4j.appender.TextFile.ImmediateFlush=true
log4j.appender.TextFile.layout=org.apache.log4j.PatternLayout
log4j.appender.TextFile.layout.ConversionPattern=%d{ISO8601} [%t] %-5p: %m%n

Gives:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.io.Writer.<init>(Writer.java:70)
	at java.io.BufferedWriter.<init>(BufferedWriter.java:83)
	at org.apache.log4j.FileAppender.setFile(FileAppender.java:287)
	at org.apache.log4j.FileAppender.activateOptions(FileAppender.java:155)
	at
org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.activateOptions(PropertyConfigurator.java:703)
	at
org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.parseAppender(PropertyConfigurator.java:692)
	at
org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.parseCategory(PropertyConfigurator.java:625)
	at
org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.configureRootCategory(PropertyConfigurator.java:503)
	at org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.doConfigure(PropertyConfigurator.java:385)
	at org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.doConfigure(PropertyConfigurator.java:320)
	at org.apache.log4j.PropertyConfigurator.configure(PropertyConfigurator.java:326)
